summary: By request, an early save file of my Breton character
descriptionHtml:
By request, an early save file of my Breton character

To get the look in the picture it takes a couple mods, the critical ones are Sakar\'s mod that smooths out the female normal maps

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=136

Followed by Bella\'s female face mod for additional meshes and textures.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

The trick is to install Sakar\'s first, then overwrite with Bella\'s. You can\'t get this look with Bella\'s alone. 

I also use Xenius\' detailed lips, detailed eyes, and the Coolsim\'s hair pack.
author: dthompson32
